header.title: The best Fence installation company in Morgan Hill
bullets: For fence repair or replacement in Morgan Hill, Ergeon is the #1 choice!
Customers love Ergeon’s easy technology-enabled process.
Create your quote, complete a property onsite visit and more all from your phone or desktop.
Our skilled local contractors will come to your property and complete your beautiful new fence!

Yelp.description: I got three estimates to replace a section of fence in my backyard, and Ergeon had the best price. Communication was good during all phases of preparation and estimate, and I'm very happy with the finished product.
Yelp.name: Susanne E.
Yelp.title: Communication was good during all phases of the project.

Google.description: We had a wonderful experience with Ergeon when we hired them to replace our backyard fence. Right from the initial video consultation to the final installation, everything was perfect. They used good quality materials (redwood and pressure treated lumber) with exemplary workmanship. Most impressive is that they provide 5 year warranty on all works and materials after installation. We would definitely use them again and recommend them to our friends!
Google.name: Amisha S.
Google.title: Right from the initial video consultation to the final installation, everything was perfect.

regulations.title: Permits & Regulations
regulations.description: See the undefined Permits & Regulations for undefined

faq.setback: that all residential development with rear or side yard setback areas adjacent to an arterial street shall provide a minimum fence/wall setback of 15 feet with an average of 20 feet from the face of the curb
faq.corner-lot-rules: Fence within 5 ft. of street side property line -  max height is 3 feet. The intersection clear vision triangle shall be the area formed by measuring twenty feet along two intersecting streets from the point of intersection, and diagonally connecting the ends of the two lines. The lines are on the property lines

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
